snippet: Three state agencies are investigating the death in Blountstown of Barbara Dawson, whom the police tried to remove from a parking lot.
lead_paragraph: Three state agencies are investigating the death in Blountstown of Barbara Dawson, whom the police tried to remove from a parking lot.

headline.main: Recordings Add Detail in Death of Woman Forced From Florida Hospital
headline.print_headline: Recordings Add Details After Death Of Woman Forced From Florida Hospital
